SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Category
Represents categories for financial transactions.
EnumUtils
Utility class for working with enums.
FileManager
Handles saving and loading Transaction data to and from a file.
InputUtils
Utility class for handling user input and input validation.
MenuManager
Provides the main user interface for interacting with the Personal Finance Tracker.
PersonalFinanceTracker
Entry point for the Personal Finance Tracker application.
Transaction
Represents a financial transaction with details such as date, amount, description, type, and category.
TransactionManager
Manages a list of financial transactions and provides methods for adding, retrieving, and analyzing them (e.g., filtering and calculating balance).
TransactionType
Represents the type of financial transaction.
